original_text: He lieth in wait secretly as a lion in his den: he lieth in wait to catch the poor: he doth catch the poor, when he draweth him into his net.
korean_text: 사자가 자기의 굴에 엎드림 같이 그가 은밀한 곳에 엎드려 가련한 자를 잡으려고 기다리며 자기 그물을 끌어당겨 가련한 자를 잡나이다

sentences.original_text: as a lion in his den
he lieth in wait to catch the poor
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 가난한 자를 잡기 위해 매복하고 있습니다

sentences.original_text: when he draweth him into his net
